name: RPG Maker VX Ace, MV & MZ Animations - Heal Spell Pack
name_original: RPG Maker VX Ace, MV & MZ Animations - Heal Spell Pack
description:
Healing Animations Pack for RPG Maker VX Ace, MV & MZ !

3 animations in the pack : Healing Spell Level 1, 2 & 3 !

Contains a sample project to easily copy/paste the sounds settings for the animations. ( for RPGM MV & MZ )

You can use it commercially in your projects, but not allowed to resell the assets themselves.

===[ UPDATES ]===

-Added files for RPG Maker MV & RPG Maker VX Ace
